Text: Tested this on Ps3, Slim and old with updated firmware. It DOESN'T by-pass the cinavia!!! Still only getting 20mins then audio cuts out!!. I endoded to dvd and played through dvd-player and works with a HD Upscale. But HD on ps3 is a no no.
